00038 namespace Ogre {
00040     class _OgreGLESExport GLESDefaultHardwareVertexBuffer : public HardwareVertexBuffer
00041     {
00042         protected:
00043             unsigned char* mData;
00045             void* lockImpl(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00047             void unlockImpl(void);
00048 
00049         public:
00050             GLESDefaultHardwareVertexBuffer(size_t vertexSize, size_t numVertices,
00051                                             HardwareBuffer::Usage usage);
00052             GLESDefaultHardwareVertexBuffer(HardwareBufferManagerBase* mgr, size_t vertexSize, size_t numVertices, 
00053                                             HardwareBuffer::Usage usage);
00054             virtual ~GLESDefaultHardwareVertexBuffer();
00056             void readData(size_t offset, size_t length, void* pDest);
00058             void writeData(size_t offset, size_t length, const void* pSource,
00059                            bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00061             void* lock(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00063             void unlock(void);
00064 
00065             void* getDataPtr(size_t offset) const { return (void*)(mData + offset); }
00066     };
00067 
00069     class _OgreGLESExport GLESDefaultHardwareIndexBuffer : public HardwareIndexBuffer
00070     {
00071         protected:
00072             unsigned char* mData;
00074             void* lockImpl(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00076             void unlockImpl(void);
00077 
00078         public:
00079             GLESDefaultHardwareIndexBuffer(IndexType idxType, size_t numIndexes, HardwareBuffer::Usage usage);
00080             virtual ~GLESDefaultHardwareIndexBuffer();
00082             void readData(size_t offset, size_t length, void* pDest);
00084             void writeData(size_t offset, size_t length, const void* pSource,
00085                     bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00087             void* lock(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00089             void unlock(void);
00090 
00091             void* getDataPtr(size_t offset) const { return (void*)(mData + offset); }
00092     };

00102     {
00103         public:
00104             GLESDefaultHardwareBufferManagerBase();

00109                     HardwareBuffer::Usage usage, bool useShadowBuffer = false);
00111             HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr
00112                 createIndexBuffer(HardwareIndexBuffer::IndexType itype, size_t numIndexes,
00113                     HardwareBuffer::Usage usage, bool useShadowBuffer = false);

00119     class _OgreGLESExport GLESDefaultHardwareBufferManager : public HardwareBufferManager
00120     {
00121     public:
00122         GLESDefaultHardwareBufferManager()
00123             : HardwareBufferManager(OGRE_NEW GLESDefaultHardwareBufferManagerBase()) 
00124         {
00125 
00126         }
